+++ General
WikidPad supports a number of global user files for functions like:
	* [TextBlocks |Text blocks]
	* [SpellChecking |Spell checking]
	* [Using WikiWords |Wikiword blacklists]
	* [WikiControl |Favorite wikis]
	* [HtmlCss |Cascading style sheets]
These files can be found in the ".WikidPadGlobals" subdirectory of the [ConfigurationFiles |Configuration directory].

rel://files/UserConfigExample3.png rel://files/UserConfigExample4.png

+++ Cascading style sheets
For CSS this directory is the location for:
	* userbase level wikistyle.css cascading style sheet
	* userbase level wikipreview.css cascading style sheet
